p: For the evaluation of babassu oil wound healing effect, rats were randomly allocated into five groups ( n = 12): group I received 1% Tween 80; group II received Dersani® (commercial oily lotion containing medium-chain triglycerides, sunflower oil, lecithin, retinol, and tocopherol, as positive control); groups III-V received babassu oil (10, 30, and 100%). The animals were treated topically once a day, with 100 µL until the 3 rd day.
